"""
Remove duplicate tuples from list considering first two elements of each tuple
"""

temp = set()


sample_data = [("a", "b", "c"), ("a", "b", "d"), ("a", "b", "e")]

unique_data = [ele for ele in sample_data if not (tuple(ele[:2]) in temp or temp.add(tuple(ele[:2])))]
